common.update: _Settings update ho gaye! Aapki preferences save ho gayi hain aur ab active hain._

afk.example:
> *AFK Ka Istemal:*
- AFK set karo: *afk [reason]*
- Example: *afk Mein busy hoon* Last seen #lastseen pehle
- Message bhejne se AFK status khud hi hat jayega
- AFK band karo: *afk off*
afk.desc: AFK (Away From Keyboard) status set karo

alive.desc: Bot ka alive status message dikhao, aur agar chahe to custom text add karo.

antifake.example:
*Antifake Status:* {0}

> *Istemal Ka Tarika:*
- *antifake list* - Country codes dekho
- *antifake add 91,1* - Allowed list mein country codes add karo
- *antifake remove 91,1* - Allowed list se country codes hatao
- *antifake on | off* - Antifake ko enable/disable karo
antifake.desc: Anti-fake number ko enable ya configure karo
antifake.not: List karne ke liye koi country codes nahi hai.
antifake.allow_prompt:
*Kripya allow karne ke liye country codes dein (whitelist mode)*
_Example: antifake allow 1,91_
antifake.disallow_prompt:
*Kripya disallow karne ke liye country codes dein (blacklist mode)*
_Example: antifake disallow 92,93_
antifake.remove_prompt:
*Kripya hatane ke liye country codes dein*
_Example: antifake remove 91_
antifake.mode_conflict_whitelist:
*‚ö†Ô∏è Modes ko mix nahi kar sakte!*

_Aap abhi Blacklist Mode mein hain. Whitelist Mode par switch karne ke liye pehle `antifake clear` use karein._
antifake.mode_conflict_blacklist:
*‚ö†Ô∏è Modes ko mix nahi kar sakte!*

_Aap abhi Whitelist Mode mein hain. Blacklist Mode par switch karne ke liye pehle `antifake clear` use karein._
antifake.cleared: *üóëÔ∏è Antifake list saaf ho gayi aur disable ho gayi*

antilink.desc: Anti-link ko enable ya configure karo
antilink.antilink_notset: Antilink sabhi links ko block karne ke liye configure hai (koi URL list set nahi hai). Specific URLs configure karne ke liye 'antilink allow' ya 'antilink disallow' use karein.
antilink.example:
Antilink Status: *{0}*

> Istemal Ka Tarika:
- antilink list - Current settings dekho
- antilink allow whatsapp.com - Khaas URLs ko allow karo
- antilink disallow facebook.com - Khaas URLs ko disallow karo
- antilink clear allow - Clear allowed URLs
- antilink clear disallow - Clear disallowed URLs
- antilink on | off - Antilink ko enable/disable karo
- antilink kick | warn | null - Link ke liye action set karo
antilink.allow_prompt: *Kripya allow karne ke liye ek URL dein.*
antilink.no_new_urls: *Koi naye URLs add karne ke liye nahi hain.* Saare URLs pehle se list mein hain.
antilink.urls_updated:
*Allowed URLs update ho gaye*

Added: {0}
Total: {1} URL(s)

_Note: URLs case-insensitive hain_
antilink.disallow_prompt: *Kripya disallow karne ke liye ek URL dein.*
antilink.no_disallowed_urls: *Koi naye URLs disallow karne ke liye nahi hain.* Saare URLs pehle se disallowed hain.
antilink.disallowed_updated:
*Disallowed URLs update ho gaye*

Blocklist mein add kiya gaya: {0}
Total blocked: {1} URL(s)

_Note: URLs case-insensitive hain_

antiword.desc: Group chat mein khaas words ko filter karo
antiword.example:
AntiWord Status: {0}
> *Istemal Ka Tarika:*
- antiword kick | warn | null - Violations ke liye action set karo
- antiword on | off - Word filtering ko enable/disable karo
- antiword add word1,word2 - Block list mein words add karo
- antiword remove word1,word2 - Block list se words hatao
- antiword list - Blocked words dekho
antiword.add_prompt: *Kripya add karne ke liye words provide karein.*
antiword.remove_prompt: *Kripya remove karne ke liye words provide karein.*

delete.desc: Anti-delete: Deleted messages ko recover karo

greet.setexample: > *Example:* setgreet Hi, ye ek bot hai. Mera boss jald reply karega.
greet.notsetgreet: > Koi greeting message set nahi hui hai.

Zyada details ke liye, yahan jayein: https://console.groq.com/keys
groq.desc: GROQ AI ke saath interact karo

kick.desc: Group se members ko remove karo.
kick.not_admin: Mein admin nahi hoon, isliye members ko remove nahi kar sakta.
kick.mention_user: Kisi user ko mention karo ya unke message ka reply karo.
kick.admin: Specified user ek admin hai, isliye unhe remove nahi kiya ja sakta.
kick.kicking_all: Sabhi non-admin members ko kick kiya ja raha hai... ({0} members). Bot ko restart karo agar aap rukna chahte hain.

add.warning: > Un numbers ko add karne se bach jo contacts mein save nahi hain; isse ban hone ka risk badh sakta hai.
add.not_admin: Mein admin nahi hoon, isliye members add nahi kar sakta.
add.invalid_number: Ek valid phone number provide karo. Example: add 91987654321
add.failed: Add karne mein asafal. Ek invite bhej diya gaya hai.

promote.not_admin: Mein admin nahi hoon, isliye roles modify nahi kar sakta.
promote.mention_user: Kisi user ko mention karo ya unke message ka reply karo.
promote.already_admin: User pehle se hi admin hai.

demote.not_admin: Mein admin nahi hoon, isliye roles modify nahi kar sakta.
demote.mention_user: Kisi user ko mention karo ya unke message ka reply karo.

invite.not_admin: Mein admin nahi hoon, isliye invite link generate nahi kar sakta.
invite.success:
Yeh raha group ka invite link:
{0}

mute.desc: Group ko admins only banata hai
mute.not_admin: Mein admin nahi hoon, isliye group settings change nahi kar sakta.
mute.mute: {0} minutes ke liye mute ho gaya.

unmute.desc: Group main sare participants message bhej sakte hain
unmute.not_admin: Mein admin nahi hoon, isliye group settings change nahi kar sakta.

join.desc: Invite link se group join karo
join.invalid_link: Ek valid WhatsApp group invite link provide karo.
join.group_full: Group full hai aur new members accept nahi kar sakta.
join.success: Group mein successfully join ho gaya.
join.request_sent: Join request bhej di gayi hai.

revoke.desc: Group invite link ko cancel karo
revoke.not_admin: Main admin nahi hoon, isliye invite link cancel nahi kar sakta.

group_info.desc: Group invite link ki details dikhao
group_info.invalid_link: Kripya ek valid WhatsApp invite link provide karo.

common_members.desc: Do ya zyada groups mein common members ko dikhao ya hatao
common_members.common_usage:
*Example*
common jid
common jid kick
common jid1 jid2
common jid1,jid2 kick
common jid1 jid2 jid3...jid999

common jid1 jid2 jid3 any
kick - sirf us group se hatane ke liye jispe apne command di hai
kickall - saare groups se hatane ke liye
any - do ya zyada common group members include karne ke liye
skip - saare groups se hatane se bachne ke liye, example skip ek group se bachne ke liye ya skip jid1,jid2,jid3 in groups se bachne ke liye.

insta.desc: Instagram posts, reels, aur videos download karo.

ison.desc: Check karo ki phone number WhatsApp par registered hai ya nahi.

lydia.usage:
Usage: lydia on | off
Kisi specific user ke liye reply ya mention karke activate karo.
lydia.note: Ye sirf reply message se kaam karta hai.
lydia.desc: Chatbot feature ko enable ya disable karo.

rotate.usage: Example: rotate right|left|flip (video ko reply karo).
rotate.not_found: Kripya ek video ko reply karo aur sahi rotation direction specify karo (right, left, ya flip).
rotate.desc: Video ko right, left, ya flip karo.

mp3.usage: Video ya audio ko reply karke MP3 mein convert karo.
mp3.not_found: Kripya video ya audio message ko reply karo.
mp3.desc: Video ko audio mein ya audio clip ko voice note mein convert karo.

photo.usage: Photo sticker ko reply karke image mein convert karo.
photo.desc: Sticker ko image mein convert karo.

reverse.usage: Video ya audio ko reply karke uska playback reverse karo.
reverse.not_found: Kripya video ya audio message ko reply karo.
reverse.desc: Video ya audio clip ka playback reverse karo.

cut.usage: Example: cut 0;30 (start;duration) (video ya audio ko reply karo).
cut.not_found: Kripya video ya audio ko reply karo aur valid start aur duration values provide karo (e.g., 10;30).
cut.desc: Audio ya video file ka ek segment cut karo.

trim.not_found: Kripya video ko reply karo aur valid start aur duration values provide karo (e.g., 60;30).
trim.desc: Video ko specified start aur duration ke beech mein trim karo.

page.not_found: Kripya image ko reply karo aur page number indicate karne ke liye ek numeric caption provide karo.
page.desc: Image ko PDF document mein ek page ke roop mein add karo.

pdf.usage: Example: pdf note (PDF ke liye ek title provide karo).
pdf.not_found: Kripya PDF document ke liye ek title provide karo.
pdf.desc: Images ko PDF document mein convert karo.

merge.usage: Example: merge 1 (video ko reply karke ek order number provide karo).
merge.not_found: Kripya video ko reply karo aur ek valid order number provide karo.
merge.desc: Multiple videos ko ek saath merge karo.
merge.merge: _ {0} videos ko merge kiya ja raha hai_

compress.usage: Video ko reply karke compress karo.
compress.desc: Video file ka size kam karo.

bass.usage: Example: bass 10 (audio ya video ko reply karo).
bass.desc: Audio file ke bass levels ko change karo.

treble.usage: Example: treble 10 (audio ya video ko reply karo).
treble.desc: Audio file ke treble levels ko change karo.

histo.usage: Audio ya video ko reply karke histogram video generate karo.
histo.desc: Audio ko visual video histogram mein convert karo.

vector.usage: Audio ya video ko reply karke vector visualization video banayo.
vector.desc: Audio ko vector visualization video mein convert karo.

crop.not_found: Kripya video ko reply karo aur crop dimensions ko sahi format mein provide karo: out_w,out_h,x,y.
crop.desc: Video ko specified dimensions mein crop karo.
crop.xcrop:
Video width: *{0}*, height: *{1}*
Output size beech mein choose karo.

low.usage: Audio ya video ko reply karke pitch ko low karo.
low.desc: Audio pitch ko low tone mein change karo.

pitch.usage: Audio ya video ko reply karke pitch adjust karo.
pitch.not_found: Kripya kisi audio ya video message ko reply karein.
pitch.desc: Audio file ki pitch adjust karo.

avec.usage: Audio ya video ko reply karke use video format mein convert karo.
avec.not_found: Kripya kisi audio ya video message ko reply karein.
avec.desc: Audio clip ko video mein convert karo.

avm.usage: Audio aur video dono ko reply karke merge karo.
avm.desc: Audio aur video files ko ek saath merge karo.

black.usage: Audio ya video ko reply karke black background ke saath video banaye.
black.desc: Audio clip ko black background ke saath video mein convert karo.

mediafire.not_found: File nahi mili. Kripya URL check karke phir se try karein.

mention.usage:
Example: mention on | off | get
(Kisi message ko reply karke specific user ko target karo.)
mention.desc: Automated replies ke liye mention feature ko configure aur manage karo.
mention.current_status: Mention {0} hai. Details ke liye, yahaan jaayein: https://levanter.site/

status.usage: Usage: status on | off | no-dl | except-view <jid,...> | only-view <jid,...>
status.desc: WhatsApp statuses ko automatically manage karo.

call.desc: Aane waale calls ko automatically reject karo.

read.desc: Aane waale messages ko automatically read karo ya band karo.

online.desc: Apne account ko hamesha online rakho.

movie.not_found: Movie nahi mili. Kripya title check karke phir se try karein.
movie.desc: OMDB API se movie ki detailed information fetch karo, including full plot.

msgs.desc: Group ke har member ka message count display karo, including individual totals aur last seen duration.
msgs.no_activity: Abhi tak koi activity record nahi hui hai.

reset.desc: Pure group ya specific member ka message count reset karo.
reset.reset_all: Sabke message counts delete ho gaye
reset.reset_one: _@{0} ke message counts delete ho gaye._

inactive.usage:
> Examples:
-inactive day 10
- inactive day 10 kick
- inactive total 100
- inactive total 100 kick
- inactive day 7 total 150
- inactive day 7 total 150 kick

Agar kick nahi likha hai, toh sirf list karein.
inactive.desc: Inactive members ko message count ya inactivity duration ke basis pe identify ya remove karo. 'Kick' likhne par members ko remove karo.
inactive.removing: _7 seconds mein {0} inactive members ko remove kiya ja raha hai_

amute.usage:
Usage: amute <hour> <min>
- amute on | off
- amute info

Text ke saath reply karke mute message set karo.
amute.desc: Group ko specified time pe automatically mute karo, aur ek custom message set karo.
amute.already_disabled: AutoMute pehle se hi disabled hai.
amute.invalid_format:
> Example:
- amute 6 0
- amute on | off
- amute info

Text ke saath reply karke mute message set karo.

aunmute.usage:
Usage: aunmute <hour> <min>
- aunmute on | off
- aunmute info
Text ke saath reply karke unmute message set karo.
aunmute.desc: Group ko specified time pe automatically unmute karo, aur ek custom message set karo.
aunmute.already_disabled: AutoUnMute pehle se hi disabled hai.
aunmute.invalid_format:
> Example:
- aunmute 16 30
- aunmute on | off
- aunmute info

Text ke saath reply karke unmute message set karo.

- zushi ping, sticker

yami.not_set: Abhi tak koi allowed commands set nahi ki gayi hai.
yami.no_commands:

üí° Commands add karne ke liye .zushi use karein

ope.usage: Example: ope ping, sticker OR ope all

ope.not_found: {0} ke liye koi allowed commands nahi mili.
ope.all_removed: Saare allowed commands remove ho gaye.

pdm.desc: Group mein promote/demote events ke liye automatic notifications enable ya disable karo.
pdm.not_found: Kripya 'on' ya 'off' specify karein. Example: pdm on

pinterest.not_found: Koi media nahi mili. Kripya URL check karke phir se try karein.
pinterest.desc: Pinterest videos ya images download karo.

plugin.desc: External plugins ko Gist URL provide karke install karo, ya installed plugins ki list dekho.
plugin.invalid: Kripya valid plugin URL ya plugin name provide karein.
plugin.not_installed: Abhi tak koi plugins install nahi ki gayi hai.

remove.desc: External plugins ko plugin name specify karke delete karo, ya saare installed plugins remove karo.

reboot.desc: Bot instance ko PM2 use karke restart karo.

fullpp.usage: Example: fullpp (kisi image ko reply karein)

jid.desc: User ya chat ka JID return karo. Mentioned user, reply message, ya current chat ke JID ko check karo.

left.desc: Current group ko chhod do. Agar additional text diya gaya hai, toh woh bhejne ke baad chhodein.

block.usage: Example: block (kisi user ko reply ya mention karein)

unblock.usage: Example: unblock (kisi user ko reply ya mention karein)

pp.usage: Example: pp (kisi image ko reply karein)
pp.desc: Replied message ki image use karke apni profile picture update karo.

whois.name: *Naam :* {0}
whois.desc: User ya group ka profile picture aur extra jaankari (jaise about, status) dikhata hai.

gjid.desc: Sabhi group JIDs aur unke group names ki list dikhata hai.

qr.usage: Usage: qr test  YA  QR image par reply karke qr
qr.desc: Diye gaye text se QR code banata hai ya replied image se QR code decode karta hai.

reddit.desc: Diye gaye Reddit post ke URL se video download karta hai.
reddit.error: Diye gaye URL ke liye koi video nahi mila.

rmbg.usage: Usage: rmbg (kisi image par reply karke)
rmbg.desc: Replied image ka background remove.bg API se hata deta hai.
rmbg.key: Is command ka use karne ke liye, remove.bg par sign up karein, apna account verify karein, API key copy karein, aur .setvar RMBG_KEY:<your_api_key> se set karein (jaise: .setvar RMBG_KEY:GWQ6jVy9MBpfYF9SnyG8jz8P). SIGNUP: https://accounts.kaleido.ai/users/sign_up | API KEY: https://www.remove.bg/dashboard#api-key
rmbg.error: API key ya image nahi mila. API key set karein aur kisi image par reply karein.

setschedule.usage:
> *Usage :*
- setschedule jid,min-hour-day-month (24 hour format mein, day aur month optional)
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 9-9-13-8
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 0-10 (roz 10 baje message bhejega)
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 0-10, once (10 baje message bhejega, sirf ek baar)
setschedule.desc: Kisi specific time par message automatically bhejne ke liye schedule karein. Target JID(s) aur time (min-hour-day-month format mein; day aur month optional) provide karein. Us message par reply karein jo aap schedule karna chahte hain.
setschedule.invalid: Galat schedule format ya time. Diye gaye Usage ko follow karein.
setschedule.no_reply: Schedule karne ke liye message par reply karein.
setschedule.scheduled: _Message *{0}* par bhejne ke liye schedule ho gaya hai_ @{1}.

getschedule.desc: Specified chat ke liye sabhi scheduled messages dikhata hai.

delschedule.desc: Target JID aur time specify karke scheduled message delete karein, ya sabhi scheduled messages hata dein.
delschedule.invalid: Galat format. Diye gaye Usage ko follow karein.

setstatus.usage: Usage: setstatus jid,jid,jid,... YA setstatus contact
setstatus.desc: Specific contacts ya imported contacts ke liye WhatsApp status set karein. Status set karne ke liye kisi message (text, image, ya video) par reply karein.
setstatus.reply_required: Status set karne ke liye kisi message par reply karein.

scstatus.usage:
Usage:
- scstatus jid,jid,jid,...|min-hour-day-month (day aur month optional)
- scstatus contact|min-hour-day-month
- scstatus delete all|min-hour-day-month
- scstatus list
scstatus.desc: Kisi specific time par WhatsApp status bhejne ke liye schedule karein. Imported contacts ke liye 'contact' use karein ya specific JIDs provide karein.
scstatus.reply_required: Status schedule karne ke liye kisi message par reply karein.
scstatus.invalid: Galat format. Diye gaye Usage ko follow karein.
scstatus.scheduled: _Status {0} par bhejne ke liye schedule ho gaya._

antispam.desc: Manage antispam protection with configurable levels
antispam.disabled_status:
üìä *Antispam Status*

üî¥ Disabled

Use `antispam on` to enable protection
antispam.deactivated:
‚ö†Ô∏è *Antispam Protection Disabled*

Spam detection is now OFF
antispam.invalid_level: ‚ùå Invalid level. Use: low, medium, high
antispam.help:
üìñ *Antispam Help*

*Commands:*
‚Ä¢ `antispam on` - Enable (default: medium)
‚Ä¢ `antispam off` - Disable
‚Ä¢ `antispam <low/medium/high>` - Change sensitivity
‚Ä¢ `antispam <warn/delete/kick>` - Change action
‚Ä¢ `antispam info` - View current settings

*Levels:*
‚Ä¢ Low - Relaxed (active groups)
‚Ä¢ Medium - Balanced (recommended)
‚Ä¢ High - Strict (problem groups)

sticker.desc: Image ya video ko sticker mein convert karein. Sticker banane ke liye kisi image ya video message par reply karein.
sticker.reply_required: Kisi image ya video par reply karein.

circle.desc: Image ko circular sticker mein convert karein.

take.usage: Usage: take <title,artists,url> (sticker ya audio par reply karke). Audio ke liye title zaroori hai; artists aur URL optional hain.
take.desc: Sticker pack ka metadata update karein. Agar sticker par reply karein, to uska pack metadata update hoga. Agar audio par reply karein, to file mein metadata (title, artists, URL) add hoga.
take.reply_required: Kisi sticker ya audio message par reply karein.
take.additional_info: Audio metadata ke liye, artists ya URL optional hain.

mp4.desc: Animated sticker (WebP) ko MP4 video mein convert karein.
mp4.reply_required: Kisi animated sticker par reply karein.

story.usage: Usage: story <username> (ya username wale message par reply karke)
story.desc: Diye gaye username ke Instagram stories download karein. Agar multiple stories hain, to download ke liye ek list provide ki jayegi.
story.not_found: Diye gaye username ke liye koi stories nahi mil sakin. ‚ùå
story.list: Total {0} stories available. Download karne ke liye ek select karein.

tag.usage: Usage: tag all | tag admin | tag notadmin | tag <custom message> (ya 'tag' ke saath kisi message par reply karke)
tag.desc: Group ke members ko tag karein. 'all' use karein sabhi members ko mention karne ke liye, 'admin' sirf group admins ko mention karne ke liye, 'notadmin' non-admin members ko mention karne ke liye, ya custom message provide karein.

tictactoe.usage:
Example: tictactoe <opponent_jid> OR tictactoe normal <opponent_jid> OR tictactoe restart <opponent_jid> OR tictactoe end
Default mode infinite hai, normal mode ke liye 'tictactoe normal' ka upyog karein.
tictactoe.desc: Kisi opponent ke saath TicTacToe khelein. Kisi user ko challenge karne ke liye unhe mention karein, unke message par reply karein, ya unka JID specify karein. Game khatam karne ke liye 'tictactoe end' use karein aur naye opponent ke saath restart karne ke liye 'tictactoe restart <opponent_jid>' use karein. Default infinite mode hai, normal mode ke liye 'tictactoe normal' use karein.
tictactoe.choose_opponent: Kisi message par reply karke ya user ko mention karke opponent choose karein. Apne aap ke saath nahi khel sakte.
tictactoe.game_restarted: Naye opponent ke saath game restart ho gayi.
tictactoe.invalid_input: Galat input. Sahi opponent provide karein ya 'end' ya 'restart' sahi tarah use karein.

tiktok.usage: Usage: tiktok <TikTok URL> (ya URL wale message par reply karke)
tiktok.desc: Diye gaye TikTok URL se video download karein.
tiktok.not_found: Video nahi mila. URL verify karein aur phir try karein.

tog.desc: Bot command ko enable ya disable karo.
tog.invalid: Galat input. Use: tog <command> on|off (jaise, tog ping off)
tog.self_reference: Kya tumhe sach mein mujhe karna hai?

trt.usage: Usage: trt ml hi YA trt ml (kisi text message ka reply karo)
trt.desc: Google Translate ka use karke text translate karo. Target language code (aur optional source language code) specify karo jab message ka reply kar rahe ho.

twitter.usage: Usage: twitter <Twitter URL> (ya URL wale message ka reply karo)
twitter.desc: Twitter video download karo. Agar multiple quality options hain, toh ek choose karne ko kaha jayega.
twitter.not_found: Diye gaye Twitter URL ke liye koi video nahi mila.

upload.usage: Usage: upload <URL> (ya URL wale message ka reply karo)
upload.desc: Diye gaye URL se media download karo. Shortened Google Images URLs ke liye, direct image URL automatically retrieve ho jayegi.

url.usage: Usage: url YA url imgur (image ya video ka reply karo)
url.desc: Image ya video ko URL mein convert karo. Optional, kisi specific service se URL pane ke liye parameter specify karo (jaise, 'imgur').

getvar.desc: Variable ka value display karo. Variable key (case-insensitive) provide karke uska value retrieve karo.

delvar.desc: Variable key specify karke usse delete karo.

setvar.desc: Specific key aur value ke saath variable set karo. Key aur value ko alag karne ke liye '=' ka use karo.
setvar.success: Naya var {0} add ho gaya, value hai {1}.

allvar.desc: Sab stored variables ko sorted order mein display karo.

vote.usage:
> Usage :
vote q|Tumhara favorite color kya hai?
o|üòÄ|Blue
o|üòä|Red
vote.desc: WhatsApp group mein vote shuru karo.
vote.notes: Agar koi recipients specify nahi kiye hain, toh vote message current group mein bhej diya jayega.
vote.delete_vote: Naya vote set karne ke liye current vote delete karo.
vote.vote: React ya reply karke vote karo.

warn.usage: Usage: warn @user YA warn reset @user. User ke message ka reply karke 'warn' ya 'warn reset' type kar sakte ho.
warn.desc: Group chat mein user ko warn karo. Ye command user ke warning count ko badhata hai. Agar count limit se zyada ho jata hai, toh user ko group se kick kar diya jayega. 'warn reset' use karke user ke warnings clear karo.
warn.reset_usage: Usage: warn reset @user (ya user ke message ka reply karke 'warn reset' type karo).
warn.cannot_remove_admin: Main admin ko remove nahi kar sakta.

wcg.usage:
Usage:
- wcg start (word chain game force start karo)
- wcg end (current game khatam karo)
Default mode easy hai.
wcg.desc: Word Chain Game: word submit karke word chain continue karo. use 'wcg start' game start karne ke liye aur 'wcg end' game stop karne ke liye.
wcg.already_used: _Yeh word pehle use ho gaya hai!_
wcg.not_starting_with: _{0} se suru nahi ho raha hai_ {1}
wcg.not_in_list: _Yeh word mere list mein nahi hai_
wcg.winner:
@{0} game jeeta üèÜ
Words : *{1}*
Longest word : *{2} ({3})* by @{4} üìö
Time : *{5}* ‚è±Ô∏è
wcg.starting:
üéÆ Game suru ho rahi hai...
üë• 2 ya usse jyada players ki jarurat hai
‚è≥ Join karne ke liye aapke pass 60 seconds hai ‚è≥
üß© Mode {0}
wcg.terminated: _Start karne ke liye pure players nahi hai. Game cancel._

wrg.usage:
Usage:
- wrg start (random word game force start karo)
- wrg hard (hard mode mein start karo)
- wrg easy (easy mode mein start karo)
- wrg end (current game khatam karo)
wrg.desc: Random Word Game: Random prompt ke response mein word submit karke khelo. 'wrg start' use karke naya game shuru karo ya 'wrg end' use karke current game khatam karo.

yts.desc: YouTube videos ko query ya URL se search karo. Agar valid YouTube URL diya gaya hai, toh pehle video ka detailed information return karo.

song.usage: Usage: song indila love story YA song <YouTube URL> (message ka reply bhi supported hai)
song.desc: YouTube se song download karo. Agar URL diya gaya hai, toh song directly download ho jayega; warna search kiya jayega aur results ki list generate ki jayegi selection ke liye.
song.not_found: Diye gaye query ya URL ke liye koi song nahi mila.

video.usage: Usage: video <YouTube URL> (ya URL wale message ka reply karo)
video.desc: YouTube video download karo. Agar direct URL diya gaya hai, toh video download ho jayegi; agar search query diya gaya hai, toh results ki list generate ki jayegi selection ke liye.
video.not_found: Diye gaye query ya URL ke liye koi video nahi mila.

update.desc: Naye updates ke liye check karo. Available updates display karo ya confirm karo ki bot up-to-date hai.

update_now.desc: Bot ko latest version mein update karo.
update_now.up_to_date: Bot already up-to-date hai. Koi updates available nahi hain.
update_now.updating: Bot ko update kar rahe hain...

antigm.usage:
> Istemal:
- antigm on | off ‚Äî Anti group mention ko enable ya disable karo
- antigm delete | warn | kick ‚Äî Jab koi group mention kare to action set karo
- antigm ignore jid,jid,... ‚Äî Specific groups se anti group mention ignore karo
antigm.action: Action update ho gaya: group mentions ab *{0}* karenge.
antigm.filter: Anti group mention ke liye ignored JIDs update ho gaye.
antigm.enabled: Anti group mention enable ho gaya hai.
antigm.disabled: Anti group mention disable ho gaya hai.

reminder.usage:
> *Reminders Istemal:*
- `reminder <text>` - Naya reminder set karein (ex: 'reunion demain √† 10h')
- `reminder list` - Saare reminders ki list dekhein
- `reminder del <id>` - Reminder delete karein
reminder.invalid_id: Kripya ek valid event ID dein.
reminder.auth_required:
*Authentication Zaroori Hai:*

Bot authorize karne ke liye "gauth" istemal karein.

gdrive.uploading: Media Drive par upload ho raha hai...
gdrive.not_authorized: Authorized nahi hai. "backup auth" istemal karein.
gdrive.list_empty: Levanter folder mein koi file nahi mili.
gdrive.invalid_id: Kripya ek valid file ID dein.
gdrive.url_prompt:
Kripya ek valid URL dein, media message tag karein, ya subcommands istemal karein: list, del <id>, dl <id>.
Example: `gupload list`
